data.title: Kaeppler, Adrienne
data.meta_site_name: Smithsonian National Museum of Natural History
data.text:
Publications

Book Chapter

Austen-Dennehy, Michele, Mason, Jean Chapman, and Kaeppler, Adrienne L. 2020. "Breadfruit Tapa: Not Always Second Best." In Material Approaches to Polynesian Barkcloth. Lennard, Frances and Mills, Andy, editors. 61–69. Leiden: Sidestone Press.
